short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minifies the Youtube TV player interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduces the size of the player interface on Youtube TV's web player when the mouse is hovered, and content is paused. Removes large gradients that cover the stream.
